goals__remit:
seafish has a crutial role in supporting the seafood industry for a sustainable and profitable future.  
 
we undertake research and development of benefit to the seafood industry, provide information on research, legislation and best prsctice,data, data collection and  marketing and promotions 
 
we cover the entire seafood chain from the marine envirnment and catching, through the supply chain and processing to retail and the consumer.  
 
Seafish take account of government policies in its work and work with government where necessary
